⊣ c7 =(LSpan ` c0)
⊣ c6 =(LSSum ` c0)

⊣ c5 =(LKer ` c0)

comment: The subspace sum of a kernel and the span of a vector not in the kernel is the whole vector space. (Contributed by NM, 12-May-2014.)
